document.paragraph: A Command Line Interface or CLI is a simple text only interface. A user provides a command with or without some additional information and then the command is exectued.
1. When you execute a command you must type the name of the command, in addition the command must be located in your PATH

list_item.paragraph: What's a PATH? A PATH is a list of directories, in these directories executables will be located. Common directories are /bin/, /usr/bin/

document.paragraph: 2. When you execute a command, you often will need to provide additional information. These are called arguments.
